voices.mp3Text: I will suffer no threat to my purpose.
Nature is not for the weak.
I feel the wild in me.
I will suffer no threat to my purpose.
I will suffer no threat to my purpose.
Oh ho ho ho! I'm telling ya! This one is in the bag!
No foe shall stand against my mission!
No foe shall stand against my mission!
It has been too long since these bones felt combat.
It has been too long since these bones felt combat.

text: Only when distance is at least 2x the cast range, 4 seconds cooldown

voices.mp3Text: I feel the wild in me.
My friend slips from this plane.
Nature's mysteries are revealed to me!
There is much still to be done!
The long years have been kind.
Ha ha ha ha ha! I can still run with these kids
I feel a thousand years younger!
Is more of my power needed?
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Nature is not for the weak.
You should have left well enough alone.
You risk more than you know.
Ha ha ha ha, this is exciting.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha! Isn't this exciting?
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha hah!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha! Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
A pity. Where was the Ulfsaar that took my finger?
voices.name: Ursa

voices.mp3Text: There are more important causes in this world than your cubs, Ulfsaar.
voices.name: Ursa

voices.mp3Text: Have you forgotten what I taught you, Ulfsaar?
voices.name: Ursa

voices.mp3Text: I've been a bear longer than you have, Ulfsaar.
voices.name: Ursa

voices.mp3Text: I will outlive your omens, Destroyer.
voices.name: Outworld Devourer

voices.mp3Text: You call those the old ways, Witch Doctor?
voices.name: Witch Doctor

voices.mp3Text: Whatever happened Enchantress, did you forget your true form?
voices.name: Enchantress

voices.mp3Text: Hasn't your science done enough damage, Tinker?
voices.name: Tinker

voices.mp3Text: Not even Dragon Clan can stand against me!
voices.name: Dragon Knight

voices.mp3Text: A pity, I would have liked to hear what the Death Prophet saw for me.
voices.name: Death Prophet

voices.mp3Text: Just what did you think such darkness would bring you, Dazzle?
voices.name: Dazzle

voices.mp3Text: Invoker, you are naught but an ignorant child.
voices.name: Invoker

voices.mp3Text: All your long years have not granted you wisdom.
voices.name: Invoker

voices.mp3Text: Eternity will be better off without the Invoker.
voices.name: Invoker

voices.mp3Text: Even you must respect my mission, Prophet.
voices.name: Nature's Prophet

voices.mp3Text: Why would the Prophet stand against me?
voices.name: Nature's Prophet

voices.mp3Text: I never thought the day would come that the Prophet's blood stained my hands.
voices.name: Nature's Prophet

voices.mp3Text: You and your pack of mongrels are nothing to me!
voices.name: Lycan

voices.mp3Text: You should have brought more wolves.
voices.name: Lycan

voices.mp3Text: You have no place here, mutt.
voices.name: Lycan

voices.mp3Text: Shapeshift your way out of that!
voices.name: Lycan

voices.mp3Text: He won't be needing that fish now, will he?
voices.name: Tidehunter

voices.mp3Text: I normally don't eat saltwater fish.
voices.name: Tidehunter

voices.mp3Text: First blood! The end is set in motion! Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Tell me what you see for us, Prophet.
voices.name: Nature's Prophet

voices.mp3Text: Tell me what you see for us, Prophet.
voices.name: Nature's Prophet

voices.mp3Text: My spirit requests your aid, Ursa Warrior.
voices.name: Ursa

voices.mp3Text: My spirit requests your aid, Ursa Warrior.
voices.name: Ursa

voices.mp3Text: You haven't aged a day, Puck.
voices.name: Puck

voices.mp3Text: You haven't aged a day, Puck.

voices.mp3Text: Always pleased to see Dragon Clan!
voices.name: Dragon Knight

voices.mp3Text: Let's show them what shifters can do, Lycan!

text: Requires visible enemy player within 1000 radius, 60 seconds cooldown

voices.mp3Text: This dagger lacks the heft of my blade.
voices.name: Blink Dagger (2250)

voices.mp3Text: A Scepter fit for the high clan lords.
voices.name: Aghanim's Scepter (4200)

voices.mp3Text: A cuirass to cover my bear ass, ha ha!
voices.name: Assault Cuirass (5250)

voices.mp3Text: A cuirass to cover my bear ass, ha ha!
voices.name: Assault Cuirass (5250)

voices.mp3Text: Mask of Madness! He he he ha ha ha ha!
voices.name: Mask of Madness (1975)

voices.mp3Text: Eternity is one thing, this is quite another.
voices.name: Aegis of the Immortal

voices.mp3Text: Eternity is one thing, this is quite another.
voices.name: Aegis of the Immortal

voices.mp3Text: Let me wash off this blood.
The years caught up to me.
The Seed of Victory is still safe!
The Seed of Victory is still safe!
I return so that the world might be mended.
I return so that the world might be mended.
I will be more careful this time.
I will be more careful this time.
Not even death can thwart my quest.
Not even death can thwart my quest.
Ha ha! This is but a short cycle. Ha ha ha ha!
I know a thing or two of patience.
There is yet time for this.
Tis long since I had any kin.
The cool touch of the gentle wild.

text: Third and more attempts within 10 seconds
Third and more attempts within 10 seconds

voices.mp3Text: Thousands of years of waiting and yet no time to waste.
This burden may be more than I can bear. Heh.
